name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay Focused: Block websites & stay productive!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity by blocking distracting websites, keywords or set daily usage limits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay Focused: The Ultimate Website Blocker for Chrome

Are you losing hours of productivity to distracting websites? You're not alone. Studies show that the average person spends over two hours daily on non-work-related websites during work hours. Stay Focused is the powerful website blocker designed to help you regain control over your time by blocking websites and keywords that distract you.

Key Features:

Website Blocker: Take control of your productivity by blocking websites that interrupt your workflow. Stay Focused empowers you to limit access to time-wasting sites with just a few clicks.
Keyword Blocking: Block keywords on Chrome to prevent yourself from accessing distracting content, helping you maintain focus on important tasks.
Daily Usage Limits: Set daily time limits for specific websites to ensure you spend no more than your designated time on them. This feature helps you cultivate healthier browsing habits.
Customizable Settings: Tailor the extension to your needs by creating custom block lists and schedules, ensuring that you stay focused when it matters most.
Cross-Platform Support: Stay Focused isn't just limited to Chrome. Enjoy the same level of productivity across all your devices with our Android and iOS apps.
Why Choose Stay Focused?

With internet distractions at an all-time high, staying focused has never been more challenging. Studies suggest that productivity can drop by up to 40% when multitasking or switching between tasks frequently. By using Stay Focused, you can significantly reduce time spent on distracting websites and improve your productivity.

Join thousands of users who have taken back control of their time and productivity with Stay Focused. Whether you're a student trying to focus on studies, a professional aiming to meet deadlines, or anyone who wants to make the most out of their day, Stay Focused is the ultimate website blocker for you.

Download Stay Focused today and transform the way you work with this effective Chrome extension!
